content: Links to all files in the room will be re-generated. Previous links to room files and embedded documents will become unavailable.

comment.text: RevokeSharedLinkDescriptionPublicRoom is used to display a message when a user attempts to revoke links to room files and embedded documents in a public room. This text appears in a dialog, specifically when deleting shared links in the Files component of a client package. It informs users that previous links will be regenerated but become unavailable.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "المستندات المضمنة" (embedded documents) feels slightly awkward and less natural in this context. A more natural phrasing might emphasize that links to *embedded content* will also be revoked.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: سيتم إعادة إنشاء الروابط إلى جميع الملفات في الغرفة. وستصبح الروابط السابقة إلى ملفات الغرفة والمحتوى المضمن بها غير متاحة.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term "embedded documents" is not accurately translated. "Əlavə olunmuş sənədlərə" literally translates to 'added documents' which doesn't convey the meaning of 'embedded'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaq faylları və daxil edilmiş sənədlərə əvvəlki keçidlər əlçatan olmayacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While grammatically correct, the phrasing 'Otaq faylları və əlavə olunmuş sənədlərə əvvəlki keçidlər əlçatan olmayacaq' could be improved for fluency in Azerbaijani. It's a bit clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Otaq faylları və daxil edilmiş sənədlərə olan əvvəlki keçidlər əlçatan olmayacaq.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'room files' is not accurately translated. 'Room files' refers to files *within* the room, not files *of* rooms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Линковете към всички файлове в стаята ще бъдат генерирани отново. Предишните линкове към файловете в стаята и вградени документи ще станат недостъпни.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The term 'lomakkeisiin' (forms) doesn't accurately reflect 'files'. The English text refers to files in general, not specifically forms.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Linkit kaikkiin huoneen tiedostoihin luodaan uudelleen.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'poistuvat käytöstä' (become unavailable) is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aiemmat linkit ja upotetut asiakirjat eivät enää toimi.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "embedded documents" is translated as "ներկառուցված փաստաթղթերի". While technically correct, a more natural and common phrasing in Armenian would be "մուշտացված փաստաթղթերի" or "ներդրված փաստաթղթերի". "Ներկառուցված" is more commonly used for built-in functionality.

The phrase "Links to all files" is somewhat awkwardly translated. A more natural phrasing might be "ລິ້ງເອກະສານທັງໝົດ" or "ລິ້ງເອກະສານທັງໝົດທີ່ຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງ". The current translation reads a little clunky.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງເອກະສານທັງໝົດທີ່ຢູ່ໃນຫ້ອງຈະຖືກສ້າງໃໝ່ອີກຄັ້ງ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Previous links... will become unavailable" could be more clearly translated.  The current phrasing 'ລິ້ງທີ່ເຄີຍໃຊ້ໄດ້...ຈະບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ໄດ້ອີກ' isn't as direct.  Consider a more active voice.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ລິ້ງທີ່ເຄີຍມີຢູ່ກ່ອນໜ້າຈະບໍ່ສາມາດໃຊ້ງານໄດ້ອີກ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'fișerele' is misspelled. It should be 'fișierele'.
The phrase 'for deveni' is grammatically incorrect. It should be 'vor deveni'.
The phrase "අ වලංගු නොවනු ඇත" translates to 'will not become invalid' instead of 'will become unavailable'. This contradicts the original English meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: කාමරයේ ගොනු සහ අන්තර්ගත ලේඛන සඳහා පෙර තිබූ සම්බන්ධතා වලංගු නොවනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Links to all files...' is a bit clunky in Slovak. While technically correct, it's not the most natural phrasing.  'Odkazy na všetky súbory...' is accurate but could be improved for flow.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Všetky odkazy na súbory v miestnosti budú vygenerované nanovo.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'embedded' could be better translated.  'Vložené' is okay, but 'pripojené' or 'integrované' might be more accurate depending on the specific context of 'embedded documents'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Všetky odkazy na súbory v miestnosti budú vygenerované nanovo. Predchádzajúce odkazy na súbory v miestnosti a pripojené dokumenty sa stanú nedostupnými.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Links to all files" is slightly awkward in Serbian. While technically correct, "Linkovi do svih fajlova" sounds less natural.  A more fluid translation might consider rewording.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Linkovi do svih datoteka u sobi

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'become unavailable' is translated as 'postaće nedostupni', which is grammatically correct but sounds slightly formal. A more conversational and natural phrasing could improve readability.
The phrase "room files" is a bit awkward. It's better to clarify what kind of files are being referred to.  'Files in the room' is more natural.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên kết đến tất cả các tập tin trong phòng sẽ được tạo lại. Các liên kết trước đó đến các tập tin trong phòng và tài liệu nhúng sẽ không khả dụng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation of "embedded documents" as "tài liệu nhúng" is technically correct, but can be improved to 'tài liệu đính kèm' to sound more natural in this context. "Nhúng" is more fitting for embedded code or data, not necessarily documents.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Liên kết đến tất cả các tập tin trong phòng sẽ được tạo lại. Các liên kết trước đó đến các tập tin trong phòng và tài liệu đính kèm sẽ không khả dụng.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "embedded documents" is not accurately translated. "嵌入式文档" literally means 'embedded documents' but the meaning might be unclear to the user. A more natural translation would convey the idea that links to documents *included* in the room will be invalid.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 房间内所有文件的链接将重新生成。之前的房间文件和包含在其中的文档的链接将失效。
